Author: sodiddlydone
Text: you're right and i thought about talking about it to my friends many times but im rlly scared to open up about it.. once i tell them there's no going back :(

Author: Losingtheplottoday
Text: I think your friend would probably appreciate you telling her and I'd imagine she would make a conscious effort to not speak so much about her weight if she knew it was a trigger for you.   It's not her fault, you're right. But it's also not your fault that it is triggering you.  If I was your friend, I would much rather be told so that I could try and help rather than losing you as a friend or having you distance yourself.   At least this way you can both still be a form of support for each other.
